H0.text: Locomotion is the process during which nutrients enter the bloodstream.

H1.text: Respiration is the process during which nutrients enter the bloodstream.

H2.text: Elimination is the process during which nutrients enter the bloodstream.

H3.text: Absorption is the process by which nutrients enter the bloodstream.

A4.text: 95% of nutrient absorption occurs in the small intestine.

A5.text: Waste material (feces) is eliminated from the rectum during defecation.
